sentences.english: Taste mellow and deep, rich wine, lingering aftertaste and balance.
sentences.chinese: 口感醇厚深邃，酒香濃郁，回味綿長而均衡。

sentences.english: Equilibrium is the product of an axiomatic system.
sentences.chinese: 均衡觀念是公理系統的產物。

sentences.english: Part four, the relation between the principle of suiting punishment to crime and the criminal individualization.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，罪刑均衡原則與刑罰個別化的關係。

sentences.english: Such a combination of fine screening and flow equalization is shown in Figure No. 26.
sentences.chinese: 圖26顯示了小格柵和水流均衡的組合狀況。

sentences.english: New features include equalisation technology and a user-friendly interface.
sentences.chinese: 新功能包括均衡技術，以及友好的用戶界面。

sentences.english: "Doctor McKee?" the man called in an even, sonorous voice.
sentences.chinese: “麥基醫生？”那個男人電話上的聲音均衡渾厚。

sentences.english: Equity of coverage in key MCH services is high throughout Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 泰國的主要婦幼保健服務覆蓋均衡性較高。

sentences.english: The obvious regional also reflects the imbalance in the development of CNC machine tools.
sentences.chinese: 地域性的明顯也反應了我國數控機牀發展的不均衡。

sentences.english: A simple frequency-domain equalization technique is proposed to tackle this problem.
sentences.chinese: 針對這種情況，提出了一種簡單的頻域均衡方法。

sentences.english: The stability of the solutions set for symmetric strong vector quasi-equilibrium problems are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究對稱強向量擬均衡問題解集的穩定性。

sentences.english: China is short of water resources. The distribution of water resources is uneven.
sentences.chinese: 中國水資源短缺，水資源分佈不均衡。

sentences.english: Describe the equilibria of a given game.
sentences.chinese: 舉出一個你參與的特殊賽局，描述其均衡。

sentences.english: The two-band British EQ is famous for its warm, musical sound.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個波段均衡器，是英國的熱情，著名的音樂聲。

sentences.english: Frigates are a vital part of any balanced sea-going fleet.
sentences.chinese: 護衛艦是任何一個配置均衡的遠洋艦隊所必需的。

sentences.english: The photographs by Jock Sturges possess a fragile equilibrium.
sentences.chinese: 斯滕格斯的攝影所擁有的就是一種易碎的均衡。

definition: whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to attend simultaneously to two or more things/to balance (career and family, family and education etc)
to stress in a prejudiced way/to emphasize sth unduly
